channel.copyright: Copyright 2023 High Tops Media & Dean Gutic
channel.title: Heavy Hitters
channel.description: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Dean Gutic

item.title: NFL Week 16 and CFB Playoff Round 1 Picks
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for this weekend’s games in the NFL for week 16 of the 2024-25 season along with his picks for each game in the first round of the 12 team college football playoff bracket.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: CFB Playoff Rankings Review, NFL Week 14 Takeaways, and Juan Soto to the Mets Reaction (ft. Keenan Womack)
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean Gutic along with special guest Keenan Womack of SI Mavericks review the newly revealed college football playoff rankings along with the 12 team playoff bracket as well as their predictions. After that, Dean and Keenan give us both of their takeaways from the NFL season so far after the week 14 games that took place on Sunday. To close out the episode, Dean and Keenan give us their reactions to the big news regarding star outfielder Juan Soto after he chose to sign a 15 year $765 million deal with the New York Mets on Sunday night.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

item.title: WWE Survivor Series: WarGames, CFB Week 12 and NFL Week 13 Predictions
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean Gutic and Jack Acello give us their picks for this week’s games in college football for rivalry week along with their picks for the games in the NFL for Thanksgiving week. After that, Dean and Jack close out the show by sharing some news in wrestling along with giving us a recap of Monday night raw and their predictions for the matches taking place at WWE Survivor Series: WarGames this Saturday.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: NFL Week 12 Picks and NHL Monthly Takeaways
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean and special guest Charley Novack give us their picks for this week’s games in the NFL along with their reactions to the firings of GM Joe Douglas of the New York Jets and head coach Jim Montgomery of the Boston Bruins. After that, Dean and Charley give us their takeaways from the first month of the NHL 2024-25 season.

item.title: CFB Week 12 and NFL Week 11 Picks, and UFC 309 Predictions
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games and both college football and the NFL along with an update of the college football playoff top 25 rankings. To close out the episode, Dean gives us his predictions for the big fights taking place this Saturday at Madison Square Garden in New York City for UFC 309.

item.description:

item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL along with providing an update with what’s going on in the 2024 World Series matchup between the New York Yankees and Los Angeles Dodgers along with his takeaways from the series so far. item.title: DeAndre Hopkins to the Chiefs Reaction, CFB Week 9, NFL Week 8, UFC 308 and MLB World Series Predictions
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to Tennessee Titans star WR DeAndre Hopkins getting traded to the Kansas City Chiefs. After that, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by also giving his predictions for the MLB World Series this year along with the main fights this Saturday at UFC 308.

item.title: CFB Week 8 and NFL Week 7 Picks, MLB ALCS and NLCS Updates, Davante Adams and Amari Cooper Trade Reactions
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean starts off the episode by giving us an update based on what’s happening in the MLB with the postseason being in the ALCS and NLCS stage. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to Las Vegas Raiders star WR Davante Adams getting traded to the New York Jets and Cleveland Browns star WR Amari Cooper getting traded to the Buffalo Bills and what it means for both teams after acquiring the two biggest names on the market prior to the trade deadline. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by giving us his pics for this week’s games and both college football and the NFL.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for the games this weekend in both college football and the NFL. Along with that, Dean gives us a review and an update with what’s been going on in the MLB postseason. Finally, Dean gives us his predictions for the upcoming 2024-25 NHL season.

item.title: MLB Wild Card Round Update, WWE Bad Blood Predictions, AEW TV Deal Review, Davante Adams Trade Rumor Reactions, and NFL Week 5 Picks (ft. Jack Acello)
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean, and special guest Jack Acello, give us an update on what has happened in the wildcard round of the 2024 MLB postseason along with their reactions to each series. After that, Dean and Jack give us their predictions for the upcoming WWE PLE Bad Blood that takes place this Saturday along with a review of the newly announced TV deal for AEW. To close out the episode, Dean and Jack both give us a reaction to how they feel about the trade rumors regarding Raiders star WR Davante Adams along with their picks for this week’s games in week 5 of the NFL season.

item.title: CFB Week 5 and NFL Week 4 Picks, MLB Late Season Review, and Matthew Sluka Leaves UNLV Over NIL Dispute Reaction
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL. Along with that, he gives us a review of what’s been going on in baseball as he gives us an update on the standings and his predictions based on how the rest of the season will go in the final week of the regular season. Finally, Dean closes out the show as he breaks some news regarding UNLV QB Matthew Sluka leaving the football program over an NIL dispute and gives us his reaction to the news and how it’ll impact the future of college football.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: MLB Pre-Trade Deadline Day Updates and Takeaways, UFC 304 Predictions, Trouble in San Francisco, and EA College Football 25 Review
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us trade news along with his takeaways in the MLB season thus far before trade deadline day. After that, Dean gives us his predictions for the main event and co-main event of UFC 304 this Saturday. Next, Dean gives us an update of what’s going on in San Francisco as the 49ers deal with the holdout misses they’re having from key players. Finally, Dean discusses his thoughts on the EA College Football 25 video game and gives us his rating on the game.

item.title: NBA Playoffs Talk and NFL Draft Recap and Reactions
item.description:
For the first time ever, High Tops Media podcasts, Heavy Hitters and One on One, do a crossover episode as Dean Gutic from Heavy Hitters and Jack Acello from the One on One podcast, along with special guest Lucas Jafet, talk about the NBA playoffs and what has happened so far along with a recap of the NFL draft and their reactions to some of the picks that were made, especially from their teams.

item.description:

item.title: Max Holloway and Alex Pereira, NHL Regular Season Recap, NHL Playoff Predictions, NHL Award Predictions and the Coyotes Move From Arizona to Salt Lake City
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to the victories of Alex Pereira and Max Holloway from UFC 300 last weekend. After that, Dean gives us a recap of the NHL regular season along with his playoff and award predictions. Finally, Dean gives us his thoughts on the Coyotes moving from Arizona to Salt Lake City after the franchise played their last game on Wednesday night against the Edmonton Oilers.

item.title: UFC 300 Predictions, WWE Wrestlemania 40 Recap, and the Pitching Problem in Baseball
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for UFC 300 this Saturday for the entire main card of the pay-per-view along with a recap of wrestlemania 40 in the WWE as a bonus segment. To finally close out the episode, Dean talks about the big pitching problem in baseball and why this problem could be an issue for a long time, especially for pitchers.

item.title: Diggs Traded From Buffalo to Houston, Athletics Move to Sacramento, and Reviewing the NHL Playoffs Wild Card Race
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to Buffalo Bills star WR Stefon Diggs being traded to the Houston Texans and what it means for the Buffalo Bills going forward, especially for the draft in late April. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to the athletics moving from Oakland to Sacramento before they move to Las Vegas in the near future after the team announced on Thursday that this would be the last season they would play in Oakland. To close out the episode, Dean gives us a review thus far of the wild card race in the eastern and western conference in the NHL with the season coming to a near end.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.description:

item.title: MLB AL West, Central, and East Predictions, Blake Snell to the Giants Reaction, Jets Bolster Offense With New Pickups and Reacting to Jackson Holliday Not Making the Orioles Opening Day Roster
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the AL West, AL Central, and AL East in the MLB for the upcoming 2024 season along with his reaction to NL Cy Young winner, Blake Snell, joining the San Francisco Giants on a two year deal. After that, Dean gives his reaction to the New York Jets, bolstering their offense, with two new big pickups in the offseason. Finally, Dean ends the episode by going on a rant as to why the Baltimore Orioles made the wrong call by not selecting Jackson Holliday to be on the team’s opening day roster.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

item.title: MLB NL East Predictions, UFC 299 Recap, Aaron Donald Retires From the NFL, Winners and Losers From the First Wave of NFL Free Agency
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the NL East in the MLB along with his reaction to White Sox starting pitcher Dylan cease getting traded to the San Diego Padres and an update on Yankees ace Gerrit Cole’s injury. After that, Dean gives us a recap of what happened last week at UFC 299 along with some big news that happened earlier in the day on Friday regarding rams, defensive tackle, Aaron Donald retiring from the NFL. Then Dean gives us his winners and losers so far after the first wave, a free agency in the NFL. Finally, Dean closes out the show by giving us his reaction in a bonus segment to the Wagner College Seahawks out of Staten Island, NY, making the NCAA men’s basketball tournament for the first time since 2003.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: Reaction to the New CFB Playoff Format, NL West Predictions and UFC 298 Main Event Recap
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to the new 5 + 7 college football 12 team playoff format that will be taking shape starting next season. Along with that, Dean gives his predictions for the NL West division in the MLB, starting off a series every week before the season starts, where he gives us his predictions for each division. To close out the episode, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in the main event of UFC 298 between Alexander Volkanovski and Ilia Topuria, which was for the UFC featherweight championship.

item.title: AFC and NFC Conference Championship Game Recap, NHL Returns to the Olympics, and Corbin Burnes Traded to the Orioles a Day After Rubenstein Buys the Team
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean talks about the AFC and NFC conference championship games as he breaks down the result and his takeaways from both games that happened last Sunday. After that, he gives us his reaction to the NHL returning to the Olympics and also with the Baltimore Orioles making a blockbuster trade for star pitcher Corbin Burnes a day after the O’s announced big news regarding new ownership of the team.

item.title: Introducing Heavy Hitters
item.description:
Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of college football, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
